verses.verse: Now the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> after their number, <S%H4557><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers <S%H1><s%>' households and the captains <S%H8269><s%> of thousands <S%H505><s%> and of hundreds, <S%H3967><s%> and their officers <S%H7860><s%> who served <S%H8334><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> in <S%H935><s%> any matter <S%H1697><s%> of the divisions <S%H4256><s%> which came in <S%H935><s%> and went out <S%H3318><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> by month <S%H2320><s%> throughout all the months <S%H2320><s%> of the year <S%H259><s%>â€”of every division <S%H4256><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> - four <S%H702><s%> thousand. <S%H505><s%>

Over the first <S%H7223><s%> division <S%H4256><s%> for the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> was Jashobeam <S%H3434><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zabdiel: <S%H2068><s%> and in his division <S%H4256><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> - four <S%H702><s%> thousand. <S%H505><s%>
He was of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Perez, <S%H6557><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%> of all the captains <S%H8269><s%> of the army <S%H6635><s%> for the first <S%H7223><s%> month. <S%H2320><s%>

Over the division <S%H4256><s%> of the second <S%H8145><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> was Dodai <S%H1737><s%> the Ahohite, <S%H266><s%> and his division; <S%H4256><s%> and Mikloth <S%H4732><s%> the ruler: <S%H5057><s%> and in his division <S%H4256><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> - four <S%H702><s%> thousand. <S%H505><s%>

The third <S%H7992><s%> captain <S%H8269><s%> of the army <S%H6635><s%> for the third <S%H7992><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> was Benaiah, <S%H1141><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiada <S%H3077><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> chief: <S%H7218><s%> and in his division <S%H4256><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> - four <S%H702><s%> thousand. <S%H505><s%>

This is that Benaiah, <S%H1141><s%> who was the mighty <S%H1368><s%> man of the thirty, <S%H7970><s%> and over the thirty: <S%H7970><s%> and of his division <S%H4256><s%> was Ammizabad <S%H5990><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>

The fourth <S%H7243><s%> captain for the fourth <S%H7243><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> was Asahel <S%H6214><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Joab, <S%H3097><s%> and Zebadiah <S%H2069><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him: <S%H4256><s%> and in his division were twenty <S%H6242><s%> - four <S%H702><s%> thousand. <S%H505><s%>

The fifth <S%H2549><s%> captain <S%H8269><s%> for this fifth <S%H2549><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> was Shamhuth <S%H8049><s%> the Izrahite: <S%H3155><s%> and in his division <S%H4256><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> - four <S%H702><s%> thousand. <S%H505><s%>

The sixth <S%H8345><s%> captain for the sixth <S%H8345><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> was Ira <S%H5896><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ikkesh <S%H6142><s%> the Tekoite: <S%H8621><s%> and in his division <S%H4256><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> - four <S%H702><s%> thousand. <S%H505><s%>

The seventh <S%H7637><s%> captain for the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> was Helez <S%H2503><s%> the Pelonite, <S%H6397><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim: <S%H669><s%> and in his division <S%H4256><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> - four <S%H702><s%> thousand. <S%H505><s%>

The eighth <S%H8066><s%> captain for the eighth <S%H8066><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> was Sibbecai <S%H5444><s%> the Hushathite, <S%H2843><s%> of the Zerahites: <S%H2227><s%> and in his division <S%H4256><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> - four <S%H702><s%> thousand. <S%H505><s%>

The ninth <S%H8671><s%> captain for the ninth <S%H8671><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> was Abiezer <S%H44><s%> the Anathothite, <S%H6069><s%> of the Benjamites: <S%H1145><s%> and in his division <S%H4256><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> - four <S%H702><s%> thousand. <S%H505><s%>

The tenth <S%H6224><s%> captain for the tenth <S%H6224><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> was Maharai <S%H4121><s%> the Netophathite, <S%H5200><s%> of the Zerahites: <S%H2227><s%> and in his division <S%H4256><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> - four <S%H702><s%> thousand. <S%H505><s%>

The eleventh <S%H6249><s%> captain for the eleventh <S%H6249><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> was Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> the Pirathonite, <S%H6553><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim: <S%H669><s%> and in his division <S%H4256><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> - four <S%H702><s%> thousand. <S%H505><s%>

The twelfth <S%H8147><s%> captain for the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> was Heldai <S%H2469><s%> the Netophathite, <S%H5200><s%> of Othniel: <S%H6274><s%> and in his division <S%H4256><s%> were twenty <S%H6242><s%> - four <S%H702><s%> thousand. <S%H505><s%>

Furthermore over <S%H5057><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> of the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%> was Eliezer <S%H461><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zichri <S%H2147><s%> the ruler: <S%H8099><s%> of the Simeonites, Shephatiah <S%H8203><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Maacah: <S%H4601><s%>
of Levi, <S%H3881><s%> Hashabiah <S%H2811><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kemuel: <S%H7055><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> Zadok: <S%H6659><s%>
of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> Elihu, <S%H453><s%> one of the brothers <S%H251><s%> of David: <S%H1732><s%> of Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> Omri <S%H6018><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Michael: <S%H4317><s%>
of Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> Ishmaiah <S%H3460><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Obadiah: <S%H5662><s%> of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> Jeremoth <S%H3406><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azriel: <S%H5837><s%>

of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> Hoshea <S%H1954><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azaziah: <S%H5812><s%> of the half <S%H2677><s%> - tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> Joel <S%H3100><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pedaiah: <S%H6305><s%>

of the half <S%H2677><s%> - tribe of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> in Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> Iddo <S%H3035><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zechariah: <S%H2148><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> Jaasiel <S%H3300><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abner: <S%H74><s%>
of Dan, <S%H1835><s%> Azarel <S%H5832><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeroham. <S%H3395><s%> These were the captains <S%H8269><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

But David <S%H1732><s%> didn't <S%H5375><s%> take the number <S%H4557><s%> of them from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and under, <S%H4295><s%> because Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> he would increase <S%H7235><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> like the stars <S%H3556><s%> of the sky. <S%H8064><s%>

Joab <S%H3097><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zeruiah <S%H6870><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> to number, <S%H4487><s%> but didn't <S%H3615><s%> finish; and there came wrath <S%H7110><s%> for this <S%H2063><s%> on Israel; <S%H3478><s%> neither was the number <S%H4557><s%> put <S%H5927><s%> into the account <S%H4557><s%> in the chronicles <S%H1697><s%> of king <S%H4428><s%> David. <S%H1732><s%>

Over the king <S%H4428><s%>'s treasures <S%H214><s%> was Azmaveth <S%H5820><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Adiel: <S%H5717><s%> and over the treasures <S%H214><s%> in the fields, <S%H7704><s%> in the cities, <S%H5892><s%> and in the villages, <S%H3723><s%> and in the towers, <S%H4026><s%> was Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uzziah: <S%H5818><s%>

Over those who did <S%H6213><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> for tillage <S%H5656><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%> was Ezri <S%H5836><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Chelub: <S%H3620><s%>

and over the vineyards <S%H3754><s%> was Shimei <S%H8096><s%> the Ramathite: <S%H7435><s%> and over the increase of the vineyards <S%H3754><s%> for the winecellars was Zabdi <S%H2067><s%> the Shiphmite: <S%H8225><s%>

and over the olive trees <S%H2132><s%> and the sycamore trees <S%H8256><s%> that were in the lowland <S%H8219><s%> was Baal Hanan <S%H1177><s%> the Gederite: <S%H1451><s%> and over the cellars <S%H214><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> was Joash: <S%H3135><s%>

and over the herds <S%H1241><s%> that fed <S%H7462><s%> in Sharon <S%H8289><s%> was Shitrai <S%H7861><s%> the Sharonite: <S%H8290><s%> and over the herds <S%H1241><s%> that were in the valleys <S%H6010><s%> was Shaphat <S%H8202><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Adlai: <S%H5724><s%>

and over the camels <S%H1581><s%> was Obil <S%H179><s%> the Ishmaelite: <S%H3459><s%> and over the donkeys <S%H860><s%> was Jehdeiah <S%H3165><s%> the Meronothite: <S%H4824><s%> and over the flocks <S%H6629><s%> was Jaziz <S%H3151><s%> the Hagrite. <S%H1905><s%>
All these were the rulers <S%H8269><s%> of the substance <S%H7399><s%> which was king <S%H4428><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>'s.

Also Jonathan, <S%H3083><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>'s uncle, <S%H1730><s%> was a counselor, <S%H3289><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of understanding, <S%H995><s%> and a scribe: <S%H5608><s%> and Jehiel <S%H3171><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hachmoni <S%H2453><s%> was with the king <S%H4428><s%>'s sons: <S%H1121><s%>
Ahithophel <S%H302><s%> was the king <S%H4428><s%>'s counselor: <S%H3289><s%> and Hushai <S%H2365><s%> the Archite <S%H757><s%> was the king <S%H4428><s%>'s friend: <S%H7453><s%>

and after <S%H310><s%> Ahithophel <S%H302><s%> was Jehoiada <S%H3077><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Benaiah, <S%H1141><s%> and Abiathar: <S%H54><s%> and the captain <S%H8269><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%>'s army <S%H6635><s%> was Joab. <S%H3097><s%>
